name: Satanic Puzzle solving
description:
Dear all,

This is an invite to the annual evilness competition. This year we're moving away from the usual torture and towards some puzzle solving because of some safety regulations from on high. I look to see you all there!

Cheers,

Satan

*****

Controls:

WASD to move, that's it.

*****

Credits:

Programming: Xhirp.

Art: Wolfie

Design: Xhirp, Wolfie.

Sound: Xhirp.

*****

Made in 3hrs for Trijam 64.
